name: bulk_select_rows
description: Select rows in multiple table components at once. Useful for syncing selections across tables, selecting related data, or multi-table operations. Each selection can be configured independently.

selections.description: Array of selection operations to apply

componentId.description: Module ID of the table component

rowIds.description: Array of row IDs to select

selectAll.description: Select all rows in this table

clearExisting.description: Clear existing selections before applying (default: true)

stopOnError.description: Stop processing if any selection fails (default: false - continues on errors)
